Title: Show My Apps
Description: This project aims to build a WPF Application that monitors resources and display them in a beautiful screen, usually seen on TV.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project aims to build a WPF Application that monitors resources and display them in a beautiful screen, usually seen on TV.

You can have good-looking monitors to your servers, your applications and whatever you can programmatically check.
